column1: Sesvete (Croatian pronunciation: [sêsʋete]) is the easternmost city district of Zagreb
column3: 009 (as of 2011) it is the most populated district as well as the second largest by area (165.255 km2).

column1: The Sesvete district includes the following local government units - local committees (Croatian: mjesni odbori)
column2: some of which are also individual settlements:
